title: Comfortable 1 BR / 1 BA with private washer and dryer
posting_body: ['Come home to a great community - Scarlett Place!', 'Address:', '3500 Summercourt Dr', 'Jonesboro, GA 30236', 'Beds:', '1  /', 'Baths:', '1 /', 'Size:', '722 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1382', 'Welcome to Scarlett Place, a residential community featuring One, Two & Three bedroom apartments in Jonesboro, GA.', 'Spacious layouts and amenities welcome you home, along with exceptional service and an ideal location within walking distance to shopping, dining and entertainment options.', 'Are you looking for an apartment for rent in Jonesboro, GA?', 'Contact our friendly, professional office staff to schedule a tour today.', 'Security Deposit:', 'Call', 'Length of Lease:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'show contact info', 'Property Features:', '➢ Controlled Access', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ Gated Community', '➢ Parking', '➢ Picnic Area', '➢ Pool', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Double Vanity', '➢ Garages', '➢ Garden Tubs', '➢ Maintenance on site', '➢ Multi Use Room', '➢ Online Services', '➢ Property Manager on Site', '➢ Public Transportation', '➢ Sundeck', 'Apartment Amenities:', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Cable Ready', '➢ Ceiling Fans', '➢ Dining Room', '➢ Disposal', '➢ Extra Storage', '➢ Kitchen', '➢ Oven', '➢ Patio/Balcony', '➢ Range', '➢ All-Electric GE Appliances', '➢ Breakfast Bar', '➢ Crown Molding', '➢ Deck', '➢ Hardwood Floors', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢ Track Lighting', '➢ Trash Compactor', '➢ Vaulted Ceilings', '➢ Walk-In Closets', 'Pets:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Business Hours:', 'Mon -
